title: Please make the Pentakill Sona sound metal
body:
Hey Riot, 

Can you please make it so the Pentakill Sona skin makes her moves sound like guitar shreds? 
If you made it actually SOUND and not just LOOK like metal... That would be great. 

You know, considering she's supposed to be all about sound.

I will buy the skin then.

replies.body: It's classified and priced a certain way. They would then have to raise the price, if they did this.

sorry, but that is a bit outdated. Compare her to Primetime Draven or any other 975 Skin. Neither her sounds, nor her animations are changed.
Also, changes to her ability sounds wouldn't require a new tape by a voiceactor, so they're more doable in comparison to other audio updates.
In the pentakill qa thread, some rioters wrote they'd like to give her new sound efects if they got the time, so hopefully this will happen somewhen.

> [{quoted}](name=chaetopterus,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=yzVB6p6I,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-28T23:04:42.119+0000)
>
> sorry, but that is a bit outdated. Compare her to Primetime Draven or any other 975 Skin. Neither her sounds, nor her animations are changed.
> Also, changes to her ability sounds wouldn't require a new tape by a voiceactor, so they're more doable in comparison to other audio updates.
> In the pentakill qa thread, some rioters wrote they'd like to give her new sound efects if they got the time, so hopefully this will happen somewhen.

Primetime Draven was specifically mentioned to be legendary tier at a lower cost as a thank-you from Riot to players for watching E-sports or something like that. Maybe just to promote epsorts hype. Either way. Not the best example. Most 975 skins with animation changes or sound changes have it on like 1 skill in particular, such as Popstar Ahri having her Q make sounds, but the rest just having a pink hue to them.

I think it would be nice, still, and I think it's a possibility that they would do it, I just wanted to point out the PT Draven thing mainly.
Actually, it's not a guitar, more of a synthetic keyboard flash riff, i guess?

As nice as it would be. 

I doubt it'll happen because it's hurts the clarification of her spells by sound. 


Although I don't think much actually changes with her overall. Easier to understand her spells by their color than sound. But they'll likely still use that excuse for never doing it.

One in how many people (not Sona mains) actually know what sounds her abilities make besides her ult?
Seriously? Could you tell the difference if you were blind?
One in 300 will rise to the occasion...

I said that would be the likely reason they wouldn't do it. 

If you're used to play vs sona, you probably know the sounds of her abilities. Thus know you need to react to it. If they changed them too much this clarity would go away.
This vote seems  little one sided. Methinks you need a no option as well.
There is no "No" when it comes to Metal.
The only reason I haven't bought this skin is because she doesn't sound metal.
you know what would be cool? if her chains would do those cool sounds while floating around.. because that would be totes worth to be bought
They have to fix arcade sona first. I feel ripped off that all the cool sounds and animations I paid for are missing.
I still wouldn't buy the skin because I have Muse and I'm sticking with that, but I'm all for more Metal.

Arcade Sona needs to be fixed/updated as well.

Riot doesn't seem to love our fair maiden of the strings anymore
